automation.text: *Melee Weapon Attack:* +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 14 (3d8+4) kinetic damage. The creature must then succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 17) or become poisoned and take 6 (2d6) toxin damage per turn. The target is also grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the Hssiss can't bite another target
